Text: As I wrote about another Torrent; "I've gotten as far as I've (Or rather they, the humans) retrieved the key, then I find myself on what seems to be me on a transport vessel back to earth, then there's this Flood-octo-thingamabob speaking somewhat retarded about some yada yada bla bla bla, then just as it seems it's about to start to load the next level, I'm thrown back to the starting-menu, "Press any key to continue" - Even if the game ended, shouldn't there be some end-credits or something??? "
